item.title: Fixing Erratic BMC Controller on PowerEdge C6100
item.author: Sam Stelfox
item.description: I randomly started experiencing an issue with one blade in one of my PowerEdge C6100 blades. It wouldn’t obey all commands issued too it via IPMI or through the BMC’s web interface. Additionally the blade would randomly power on when off, and the front light would consistently blink as if a hardware fault was detected. This has been bothering me for a while, but it was my spare blade and wasn’t affecting my lab in anyway so I’ve ignored it.

item.title: Updating BMC on Dell PowerEdge C6100
item.author: Sam Stelfox
item.description: I just received my Dell PowerEdge C6100 and found it’s software quite a bit outdated. After searching around quite a bit I found the resources lacking for explaining how to perform these updates. So in this post I’m going to quickly cover updating the BMC firmware on each blade. The system I received had four different versions of the BMC software installed, additionally Two were branded as MegaRAC and the others branded as Dell.
